name: WP Exocep
author: Exocep

sections.description:
The easiest way to integrate Exocep, the CRM service dedicated to winemakers, features to your WordPress site.
For now, you can use exomap shortcode to display a map of your resellers.
You need an account on http://www.exocep.com in order to obtain an API key and access these features.

Translations

  • English – default
  • French

Demos

  • ExoMap with Markers
sections.installation: Install the plugin and fill in the form in the setting page with the api key which was provided to you.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial release
  • Added settings page
  • Added exomap shortcode

1.1.0

  • Show user location
  • Added tag filtering
  • Added test / production environment choice

1.1.1

  • Bug fixes

1.1.2

  • Bug fixes

1.2.0

  • Added exolead shortcode

1.2.1

  • Performance improvements

1.2.2

  • Style improvements

1.2.3

  • Changed api domain

1.2.4

  • Updated Mapbox endpoint

1.2.5

  • Upgraded tested version
